Learning In Public

I'm so glad I found Tania Rascia's site. There are many developers out there who do written tutorials, but her guides are just superb, at least the ones I've gone through so far. Her intro to React is one of the best out there. She recently redesigned her site and wrote about it. Her site is super slick and clean. She inspires me to follow in her footsteps of learning in public here with this blog.

Jun 29 2020 by Jay Cruz
